## Case study of outcome reporting bias

Background

Considering the importance of a better and more effective dialogue between science and policy(Young et all, 2013)

The outcome reporting is a potential type of bias when interpreting the data and results of a environmental research. It important to estimate the poorly reported, misinforming policy and practice.
